Class DocIndexerXmlHandlers.DocumentElementHandler

  • java.lang.Object

    DocIndexerXmlHandlers

    public class DocIndexerXmlHandlers.DocumentElementHandler
extends HookableSaxHandler.ElementHandler
    Handle Document element. Starts a new Lucene document and adds the attributes of this element (if any) as metadata fields.
